verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> Ye shall make לָכֶ֜ם אֱלִילִ֗ם <S%H457><s%> you no idols וּפֶ֤סֶל <S%H6459><s%> nor graven image וּמַצֵּבָה֙ <S%H4676><s%> a standing image לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָקִ֣ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> neither rear you up לָכֶ֔ם וְאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> of stone מַשְׂכִּ֗ית <S%H4906><s%> [any] image לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתְּנוּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> neither shall ye set up בְּאַרְצְכֶ֔ם <S%H776><s%> in your land לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <S%H7812><s%> to bow down עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto it for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֣י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֔רוּ <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall keep וּמִקְדָּשִׁ֖י <S%H4720><s%> my sanctuary תִּירָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> and reverence אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD ס

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בְּחֻקֹּתַ֖י <S%H2708><s%> in my statutes תֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> walk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹתַ֣י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments תִּשְׁמְר֔וּ <S%H8104><s%> and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> Then I will give גִשְׁמֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1653><s%> you rain בְּעִתָּ֑ם <S%H6256><s%> in due season וְנָתְנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> shall yield הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the land יְבוּלָ֔הּ <S%H2981><s%> her increase וְעֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> and the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> shall yield פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H6529><s%> their fruit

וְהִשִּׂ֨יג <S%H5381><s%> shall reach לָכֶ֥ם דַּ֙יִשׁ֙ <S%H1786><s%> And your threshing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּצִ֔יר <S%H1210><s%> unto the vintage וּבָצִ֖יר <S%H1210><s%> and the vintage יַשִּׂ֣יג <S%H5381><s%> shall reach אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> unto the sowing time וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H398><s%> and ye shall eat לַחְמְכֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> your bread לָשֹׂ֔בַע <S%H7648><s%> to the full וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3427><s%> and dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> safely בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> in your land

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> And I will give שָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> peace בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וּשְׁכַבְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7901><s%> and ye shall lie down וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no מַחֲרִ֑יד <S%H2729><s%> and none shall make [you] afraid וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֞י <S%H7673><s%> and I will rid חַיָּ֤ה <S%H2416><s%> beasts רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> neither shall the sword לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and no תַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> go בְּאַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> through your land

וּרְדַפְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7291><s%> And ye shall chase אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H341><s%> your enemies וְנָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> and they shall fall לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before לֶחָֽרֶב <S%H2719><s%> you by the sword

וְרָדְפוּ֨ <S%H7291><s%> of you shall chase מִכֶּ֤ם <S%H4480><s%> at חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <S%H2568><s%> And five מֵאָ֔ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וּמֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred מִכֶּ֖ם <S%H4480><s%> at רְבָבָ֣ה <S%H7233><s%> of you shall put ten thousand יִרְדֹּ֑פוּ <S%H7291><s%> to flight וְנָפְל֧וּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H341><s%> and your enemies לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before לֶחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> you by the sword

וּפָנִ֣יתִי <S%H6437><s%> For I will have respect אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> toward וְהִפְרֵיתִ֣י <S%H6509><s%> unto you and make you fruitful אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֖י <S%H7235><s%> and multiply אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וַהֲקִימֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> you and establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <S%H398><s%> And ye shall eat יָשָׁ֖ן <S%H3465><s%> the old נוֹשָׁ֑ן <S%H3462><s%> old store וְיָשָׁ֕ן <S%H3462><s%> supply מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> because חָדָ֖שׁ <S%H2319><s%> of the new תּוֹצִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> and bring forth

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will set מִשְׁכָּנִ֖י <S%H4908><s%> my tabernacle בְּתוֹכְכֶ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תִגְעַ֥ל <S%H1602><s%> shall not abhor נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> you and my soul אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְהִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֙ <S%H1980><s%> And I will walk בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> among וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> you and will be לָכֶ֖ם לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> your God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> and ye תִּהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> and ye shall be לִ֥י לְעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> my people

אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H430><s%> your God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הוֹצֵ֤אתִי <S%H3318><s%> which brought you forth אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִֽהְיֹ֥ת <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם עֲבָדִ֑ים <S%H5650><s%> that ye should not be their bondmen וָאֶשְׁבֹּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> and I have broken מֹטֹ֣ת <S%H4133><s%> the bands עֻלְּכֶ֔ם <S%H5923><s%> of your yoke וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> קֽוֹמְמִיּֽוּת׃ <S%H6968><s%> upright פ

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> But if ye will not hearken לִ֑י וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> unto me and will not do אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> all these commandments הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בְּחֻקֹּתַ֣י <S%H2708><s%> my statutes תִּמְאָ֔סוּ <S%H3988><s%> And if ye shall despise וְאִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> and if אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments תִּגְעַ֣ל <S%H1602><s%> abhor נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> or if your soul לְבִלְתִּ֤י <S%H1115><s%> not עֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> so that ye will not do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתַ֔י <S%H4687><s%> all my commandments לְהַפְרְכֶ֖ם <S%H6565><s%> [but] that ye break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <S%H1285><s%> my covenant

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> turn אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> I also will do זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָכֶ֗ם וְהִפְקַדְתִּ֨י <S%H6485><s%> this unto you I will even appoint עֲלֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> over בֶּֽהָלָה֙ <S%H928><s%> over you terror אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁחֶ֣פֶת <S%H7829><s%> consumption וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקַּדַּ֔חַת <S%H6920><s%> and the burning ague מְכַלּ֥וֹת <S%H3615><s%> that shall consume עֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> the eyes וּמְדִיבֹ֣ת <S%H1727><s%> and cause sorrow נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> of heart וּזְרַעְתֶּ֤ם <S%H2232><s%> and ye shall sow לָרִיק֙ <S%H7385><s%> in vain זַרְעֲכֶ֔ם <S%H2233><s%> your seed וַאֲכָלֻ֖הוּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H341><s%> for your enemies

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> And I will set פָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּכֶ֔ם וְנִגַּפְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5062><s%> against you and ye shall be slain לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H341><s%> your enemies וְרָד֤וּ <S%H7287><s%> you shall reign בָכֶם֙ שֹֽׂנְאֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8130><s%> they that hate וְנַסְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5127><s%> over you and ye shall flee וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> no רֹדֵ֥ף <S%H7291><s%> when none pursueth אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> ס

וְאִ֨ם־ <S%H518><s%> If עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> And if ye will not yet אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> for all this hearken לִ֑י וְיָסַפְתִּי֙ <S%H3254><s%> more לְיַסְּרָ֣ה <S%H3256><s%> unto me then I will punish אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7651><s%> you seven times עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> for your sins

וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֖י <S%H7665><s%> And I will break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> the pride עֻזְּכֶ֑ם <S%H5797><s%> of your power וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> and I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמֵיכֶם֙ <S%H8064><s%> your heaven כַּבַּרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> as iron וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצְכֶ֖ם <S%H776><s%> and your earth כַּנְּחֻשָֽׁה׃ <S%H5154><s%> as brass

וְתַ֥ם <S%H8552><s%> shall be spent לָרִ֖יק <S%H7385><s%> in vain כֹּחֲכֶ֑ם <S%H3581><s%> And your strength וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תִתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> shall not yield אַרְצְכֶם֙ <S%H776><s%> for your land אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְבוּלָ֔הּ <S%H2981><s%> her increase וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> neither shall the trees הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> yield פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H6529><s%> their fruits

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תֵּֽלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> act עִמִּי֙ <S%H5973><s%> against קֶ֔רִי <S%H7147><s%> contrary וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֹאב֖וּ <S%H14><s%> unto me and will לִשְׁמֹ֣עַֽ <S%H8085><s%> not hearken לִ֑י וְיָסַפְתִּ֤י <S%H3254><s%> more עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> and מַכָּ֔ה <S%H4347><s%> plagues שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven times כְּחַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> upon you according to your sins

וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּ֨י <S%H7971><s%> I will also send בָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> beasts הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> wild וְשִׁכְּלָ֣ה <S%H7921><s%> among you which shall rob you of your children אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְהִכְרִ֙יתָה֙ <S%H3772><s%> and destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּהֶמְתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H929><s%> your cattle וְהִמְעִ֖יטָה <S%H4591><s%> and make you few in number אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְנָשַׁ֖מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> shall be desolate דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> and your [high] ways

וְאִ֨ם־ <S%H518><s%> and if בְּאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not תִוָּסְר֖וּ <S%H3256><s%> And if ye will not be reformed לִ֑י וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֥ם <S%H1980><s%> by me by these things but will walk עִמִּ֖י <S%H5973><s%> against קֶֽרִי׃ <S%H7147><s%> contrary

וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <S%H1980><s%> Then will I also walk אַף־ <S%H637><s%> yet אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I עִמָּכֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> against בְּקֶ֑רִי <S%H7147><s%> contrary וְהִכֵּיתִ֤י <S%H5221><s%> unto you and will punish אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> you yet אָ֔נִי <S%H589><s%> you שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven times עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for חַטֹּאתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> for your sins

וְהֵבֵאתִ֨י <S%H935><s%> And I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> upon חֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword נֹקֶ֙מֶת֙ <S%H5358><s%> upon you that shall avenge נְקַם־ <S%H5359><s%> the quarrel בְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of [my] covenant וְנֶאֱסַפְתֶּ֖ם <S%H622><s%> and when ye are gathered together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> within עָרֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5892><s%> your cities וְשִׁלַּ֤חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> I will send דֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1698><s%> the pestilence בְּת֣וֹכְכֶ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> among וְנִתַּתֶּ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> you and ye shall be delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> of the enemy

בְּשִׁבְרִ֣י <S%H7665><s%> [And] when I have broken לָכֶם֮ מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> the staff לֶחֶם֒ <S%H3899><s%> of your bread וְ֠אָפוּ <S%H644><s%> shall bake עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten נָשִׁ֤ים <S%H802><s%> women לַחְמְכֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> your bread בְּתַנּ֣וּר <S%H8574><s%> oven אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> in one וְהֵשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> again לַחְמְכֶ֖ם <S%H3899><s%> [you] your bread בַּמִּשְׁקָ֑ל <S%H4948><s%> by weight וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H398><s%> and ye shall eat וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> and not be satisfied ס
